title: Left Below
description: Mr. Thompson doesn’t believe in religion, won’t go to church, and is having an affair. He dismisses his wife when she says the rapture is near…
quote: Where did my Christian limo driver go?!
altHero: people hold on to a taxi and hot dog cart as water floods the city
alt1: Mr. Thompson drinks coffee and reads a newspaper with headline “Permissive lifestyles on rise” with his concerned wife nearby
alt2: Mr. Thompson making out with another woman as his limo driver looks back in judgement
alt3: in the aftermath of the limo crashing, Mr. Thompson sees that some people, including babies, have disappeared leaving their clothes behind
alt4: Mr. Thompson repents on his knees
